p: The analyses were performed using the software GraphPad Prism 5.0 (GraphPad Software, La Jolla, California, USA). The Student’s test was for toxicity analysis and the analysis of variance (ANOVA) was used to obtain data on the rate of inhibition of the microorganisms and the treatment time of the groups. Statistically, significant differences were found with values of p < 0.05. The IC 50 value was also acquired by linear regression using the software GraphPad Prism 5.0 (GraphPad Software, La Jolla California USA). The effects of the interaction between the treatments and doxycycline were also evaluated by the analysis of the combination of multiple drugs using the software CompuSyn ® (Chou and Talalay 1984).
